titles.title: To clarify section 1702 of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to include penalties for violations of title XVII of that Act.

bill.summary: 5/30/2012--Introduced. Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to make any federal government official who is responsible for the issuance of an innovative technology loan guarantee that violates the requirements of such Act personally liable for a civil penalty in an amount of at least $10,000 but no more than $50,000 for each violation.
